channel.title: network on shengli's blog
channel.description: Recent content in network on shengli's blog

item.title: Use DPDK to accelerate LTE networks
item.description: Along with the revolution of FlexRAN, the Tele was required to provide more flexible services to the customers. One of them is Tele want to provide more customsize services to the paticular users, such like Oil, Medical etc manufacture industries, who want intergrate more industried services within some fixed area.

item.title: Efficient data transfer through zero copy
item.description: Zero-copy I/O practice in project Recently weeks, I was working on how to exploit the potentialities with the GMAC(1G Ethernet Media Access Controller) on the SoC in my desktop.
